episode.title: That New Laptop Smell
episode.rawTitle: 92: ‘That New Laptop Smell’ With Joanna Stern
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Topics include Joanna’s recent review of over 20 laptops; the HTC One M8 for Windows Phone; why Windows Phone is still struggling to gain traction; the role of Microsoft Office in today’s world; and speculation on Apple’s upcoming iPhone event.
episode.showNotes:
Topics include Joanna’s recent review of over 20 laptops; the HTC One M8 for Windows Phone; why Windows Phone is still struggling to gain traction; the role of Microsoft Office in today’s world; and speculation on Apple’s upcoming iPhone event.
